channel.title: GenesisPK || How pking should be! 562/634
channel.description:
[center][IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/2n0jwuh.png[/img][/center]
This is a server mainly based on pking, although it has few skilling areas for people who are into that kind of thing.
- Flawless Switching - Wildy Ditch - Skilling - Bossing - Perfect Combat
Website: [url=http://genesispk.enjin.com/home]http://genesispk.enjin.com/home[/url]

Head Admin: None

Head Mod: Darrien

We have tons of staff spots open so hurry and apply at our website, also get the downloadable client from our website as well.

Any issues with the server you would like to raise please contact Scott or Darrien in-game or through the websites chat feature.
